title: Interpretation of a dream about a gold chain for a married or unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a gold chain for a married woman: Gold is a precious metal used in making jewelry that women use as adornments. It is considered one of the favorite jewelry for many women, and all types of jewelry are made from beautiful bracelets, rings, earrings, and sets that suit all tastes, so what about that? It means that a woman dreams of gold. Today and until today, various. We will look for an interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a gold chain for a married woman. The only one. In general, what does it mean to see gold in a dream? Follow us. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a single girl: Seeing gold in a dream for an unmarried girl is a good sign, and scholars have interpreted it as A good man will marry her. A golden crown in a dream is a wedding for an engaged couple and a good situation for a single woman. Gold chains in a dream are good news, while silver chains are good news for the dreamer. If she dreams that she is wearing chains around her neck, this indicates an upcoming marriage. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married girl If a married woman dreams of buying gold, this means that the dreamer will receive blessings, goodness, and abundance. If a married woman dreams that her husband gives her gold, this means that the dreamer will live a happy married life full of love and happiness. If a woman dreams that she sees a lot of gold in If a married woman dreams that she is wearing very precious gold, this indicates her strength and solidity and that she will solve her problems and worries and will try to achieve all the goals she seeks. If a married woman dreams that she is walking on a road Where you find gold, this indicates the upcoming pregnancy that she will be happy with. These are some interpretations of the interpretation of a dream about a gold chain for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman dreams that she is buying gold and she is very happy, then the dream indicates that something good awaits her and that her life The future will be filled with happiness and stability, God willing. If a divorced woman dreams that she is wearing a lot of gold, this means that she will get rid of the worries and problems that surround her. If a divorced woman dreams that her ex-husband gives her gold, this means that she will marry again and live a happy married life, and that her life It will be filled with peace and stability. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman seeing gold indicates that the baby is male and that he will have a bright future and a great relationship between people. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is wearing gold, this means that her birth will be easy and simple. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is wearing gold, this means that her birth will be easy and simple. By purchasing gold, it means that she will receive goodness, happiness, blessing, and a lot of food in her life. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a man: If a man dreams that he is buying gold, his vision indicates that he will be able to solve the problems and obstacles that he faces. For a man to wear gold in a dream and he is happy It means that he will pay his debts and achieve his goals and ambitions. A gold ring in a dream: If someone dreams of a golden ring in a dream and is overwhelmed with happiness, this indicates his success if he is a student

title: Interpretation of seeing blue bruises in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Through our article, we provide you with an answer to the question, “What is the interpretation of seeing blue bruises in detail in a dream?” According to our article in the Encyclopedia, it is one of the dreams that many people have and that carries within it many symbols and associations that refer to it in reality, such as the appearance of blue spots on the thigh or the appearance of bruises on the thigh. Many interpretations have emerged, while some wake up from their stagnation looking for interpretations that came from seeing blue bruises in different places on the body, according to what is mentioned in dream interpretation books, so we offer you a tour to learn about these interpretations. Seeing a dream about bruises through our website, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing blue bruises in a dream. Many people wonder about the interpretation of seeing blue bruises in a dream and what they symbolize. Blue bruises cause a feeling of pain, so the dreamer wakes up from his stagnation anxious and disturbed, searching for the interpretations that bruises and evil bring. , such as bruises. It is the one that appears in the body medically in the case of blood retention under the skin, only to appear suddenly due to the exposure of the blood vessels to significant damage. While some believe that this vision is the one that refers to the symbols of the following, as happened to our master Abraham, peace be upon him, that God ordered the killing of his son Ishmael in order to ransom him. Then, it happened with him. Our Master Joseph, peace be upon him, saw the sun and the curvature of the moon. Is the vision of blue bruises considered a good vision or not a good vision? We highlight this below: To see blue bruises in a dream symbolizes. Exposing him to the envy and hatred of those around him, so he seeks help from God Almighty and repeats the legal ruqyah, and God knows best. Seeing blue bruises on a dreamer means: some sinners follow him in all his successes with great envy and others, and God knows the unseen. Seeing blue bruises on the dreamer explains that; There are those who do not want to see him succeed and seek to make it fail, so he must beware and seek refuge in God from the accursed Satan, and be prepared in prayer, and God knows best. Seeing blue bruises on the dreamer indicates this; That the fortuneteller is being bewitched by someone who wants to harm him, and his success and strong determination, but God knows best. Seeing blue bruises indicates to the dreamer. The dreamer is surrounded by many people who do not fear God within him and want to harm him, so he should be careful, and God knows best. Seeing blue bruises in a dream is one of those visions that do not bode well, as it symbolizes hatred, envy, and the evils that those around him are exposed to in reality, so he should recite Surat Yasin, the believers, and the legal incantation that protects him from all evil, and God knows best. Interpretation of blue bruises in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous dream interpreters, as he published a series of books containing interpretations, including the interpretation of blue bruises. Interpreted by the respected scholar Ibn Sirin Blue bruises in a dream are symbolic. Crises, problems, and troubles occur in the dreamer’s life in reality, and God knows best. Seeing blue bruises in a dream, according to the scholar Ibn Sirin, means that the dreamer is exposed to great burdens and pressures, so he must focus until he wakes up.

title: Secrets of interpreting a dream about henna by Ibn Sirin in good and evil

preview.html: The secrets of interpreting a dream about henna by Ibn Sirin in good and evil. Many women consider henna a type of adornment that they use to decorate their bodies on special occasions and weddings. Henna is considered one of the rituals used in wedding ceremonies in many countries and religions. There are girls and women who see henna in their dreams and are looking for Interpretation and meaning of this vision. In this article, today we will learn about the secrets of interpreting a dream about henna through Ibn Sirin in good and evil. Interpretation of a dream about seeing henna in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: If a woman sees in her dream that she is putting henna on her hand, this is a vision. Good portends the coming of happy events and hearing good news in the very near future. Seeing henna on the hand in a dream symbolizes a feeling of comfort, calm, peace of mind, and the removal of worries and sorrows. If you see yourself dyeing hair with henna in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer’s circumstances will change for the better. And if The dreamer was suffering from problems and worries and saw henna in his dream. This is a good vision that portends the coming of comfort and relief from distress and the death of worries. Interpretation of a dream about seeing henna in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees henna patterns in her dream, this is a vision that heralds her marriage in the near future. Interpretation scholars say Dreams: Seeing henna inscriptions in a dream for one girl symbolizes travel. However, if an unmarried girl sees henna inscriptions in her dream and it looks ugly and she does not like it, this is a sign that she will marry someone who will cause her unhappiness and sadness, and she must think a lot before choosing her. life. Partner. If an unmarried girl dreams of putting henna on her hair, this is a vision of concealment. Putting henna on the hair in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she will achieve the dreams she seeks. Interpretation of a dream about seeing henna in the hair in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she If she applies henna, this is a good vision that portends the coming of pleasant events and happy occasions. Seeing bad and ugly henna patterns in a married woman’s dream is an unpleasant vision that carries bad connotations and indicates the emergence of many problems for the dreamer’s family. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is putting henna on her hair This is a vision that portends family stability, tranquility, a happy life, and contentment. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing henna in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of a dream about seeing henna on the hand of a pregnant woman in a dream: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is putting henna on her hair, This is a good vision that portends an easy and trouble-free birth. Seeing henna in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the end of the problems and pain that she suffers from. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is removing henna, this is an unpleasant vision, and indicates the arrival of worries, problems, and sorrows in her life. If A pregnant woman saw a lot of henna in her dream, so this is a sign that God will give birth to a male child. Interpretation of seeing henna in a dream for a manIf a man sees in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about breaking eggs according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The meanings of one who sees eggs being broken, or one who sees a broken egg, or one who sees eggs being broken in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, according to the translator Ibn Sirin Al-Imam Al-Sadiq. And other great dream interpreters. Breaking eggs in a dream is one of the dreams that appear to us in many and very different forms and causes us anxiety and confusion in order to know their correct interpretation. Eggs are among the important foods recommended by all doctors around the world, in order to obtain the full health benefits of fully nourishing the body. We may see eggs with many different meanings that carry important connotations for us. We will look for you at the complete interpretations of seeing eggs broken in a dream, which were explained by the great interpreter Ibn Sirin in its various forms: Interpretation of breaking eggs in a dream: The dream of breaking eggs indicates an imminent engagement, engagement, or Marriage and indicates finding a suitable partner, if the dreamer is an unmarried girl or a young man. Anyone who dreams of breaking eggs indicates that he will suffer a loss in someone close to you, especially if you have a sick person or have recently had health problems. Falling and breaking eggs indicates in A dream indicates many problems. If eggs fall and break in a married woman’s dream, this indicates the destruction of her life with her husband. Eggs falling and breaking in a pregnant woman’s dream in the first months of pregnancy indicate the loss of the fetus, while if eggs fall and break in a pregnant woman’s dream in the last months of pregnancy, then this It indicates that the date of birth is near. Buying eggs and falling in a dream is a sign that you will make a promise to someone, but unfortunately you will fail to keep your promise. Breaking eggs in a dream generally indicates danger and the loss of a loved one. If you break eggs in a vision, it means that you are violating the rights of others, taking away Their rights and harm them. Interpretation of breaking eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that breaking eggs in your dream is not good and indicates many problems and indicates a loss of psychological comfort for the dreamer. Breaking eggs according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation indicates the need to follow the people around you and improve their behavior. The married woman who She sees eggs breaking in a dream. The vision indicates that she must warn her children and correct their behavior so that they are not exposed to harm. If a pregnant woman dreams of breaking eggs, this means that she will give birth to a child whose health condition will not be good. Broken eggs in a dream are bad in all respects unless you see yourself She breaks eggs and uses them to prepare food, as in this case it indicates gaining large profits and a very good living for the dreamer and his family. Interpretation of breaking eggs in a dream for a single womanBreaking eggs in a single woman’s dream indicates many problems with her lover. If an unmarried woman dreams of breaking eggs, this It indicates a lack of trust in her lover. The girl who sees breaking eggs in a dream, the vision is a sign of her separation from her lover due to a difference of opinion. Buying eggs in a single woman’s dream and then breaking the eggs. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is breaking eggs, this means that she is speaking in full

title: Interpretation of seeing the tongue in a dream for a single girl married to a pregnant woman

preview.html: The meaning of the tongue, the mouth, and the taste of things according to Ibn Sirin, whether the tongue was cut or injured, bleeding and swallowing, eating a tongue tied and holding his tongue. Interpretation of language in dreams. The tongue in a dream indicates the essence that the fortuneteller carries inside him in reality. Either the fortuneteller has a good and righteous soul, or he has a good soul. It is corrupt and malicious, and what is seen is the tongue, as it is an interpreter and expresser of what one person carries within him. It has been said that the language is the argument and evidence that the dreamer possesses in reality, if he is in a dispute, or if it is knowledge, knowledge, fame and reputation. Imam Ibn Sirin mentioned the interpretation and meaning Seeing a tongue that is longer, wider, or flatter than it is in reality, as it has been derived from the meanings mentioned in these cases that they all indicate victory, empowerment, and the strength that the fortuneteller possesses in his argument if he is against the opponent in reality, and it has also been said that the length of the tongue in a dream may It indicates the eloquence, eloquence, and literature that the dreamer possesses in his speech in real life. And the person who sees in his dream that he has more than one or two languages, then his vision indicates an increase in knowledge and the acquisition of some new sciences that he did not understand if the dreamer was a person of knowledge and knowledge. A new and strong argument in addition to the arguments available to the dreamer to strengthen his position in the conflict. However, if the dreamer is a fighter and mujahideen, then the vision indicates strength and victory over the enemy. It is said that the length of the tongue in the dream of a ruler or president may indicate the expansion of his country and the entry of some new territories and areas under his rule. And his administration, and it may also indicate the intensification and development of power, the raising of soldiers and fighters, as well as the acquisition of money and assets that serve the interests of his state from various sources in reality. It was said about the length of the tongue in a dream when the quarrel is free and does not exist in reality that this situation may indicate obscenity. This tongue and the insulting words that come out of it. Business and art from which the fortuneteller derives his strength. Seeing hair growing on the tongue in a dream has one of two meanings, both of which are bad. The dreamer's life is in the near future, but if the color of the hair in the dream that grows on the tongue is white, the dream indicates the calamities and disasters that come to the dreamer in his life, but after a period of time. And whoever sees his tongue cut out in his dream, then his vision indicates the humiliation and humiliation to which he is exposed. If he is high in reality, or if he is removed from his position and authority if the dreamer is a ruler. president. Circumstances, and if the ruler’s tongue becomes very long until it reaches the sky in its length, then this vision shows the end of that person’s rule in reality due to some unjust measures he took during his reign. Interpretation of language in a dream The tongue refers to father, son, kinship, friend, prestige, profit, and worship. What is good about it: it goes back to what we mentioned. But if it is cut off or prevails, or its benefit is cut off, or it is cut off, or a calamity befalls it, then its worship is invalidated, or it separates his son, or his father, or his teacher, or a friend of his, or a relative for whom he has benefited, or his condition disappears, or his livelihood is disturbed, or he is defeated in his affairs. His disputes. Slavery

But if it is cut off or prevails, or its benefit is cut off, or it is cut off, or a calamity befalls it, then its worship is invalidated, or it separates his son, or his father, or his teacher, or a friend of his, or a relative for whom he has benefited, or his condition disappears, or his livelihood is disturbed, or he is defeated in his affairs. His disputes. Slavery

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying a girl according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying a girl can have many meanings and interpretations for the dreamer's life, depending on the details he narrates. A girl may see that she is marrying her friend or that she is marrying her mother, and there are those who dream that the girl in front of her marries a girl, or that her husband marries another. Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying a girl The interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying a girl may be just a reflection of the bad thoughts circulating in the fortune teller's mind, and here he may have to stop thinking about wrong things and focus on the correct positive things and pray to God Almighty to guide him and guide him to well-being. Dreaming of a woman marrying a woman may symbolize an act of disobedience and sins and that the dreamer repents to God Almighty as soon as possible and supplicates to Him Almighty to forgive her past mistakes, and God knows best. Dreaming of a woman marrying a woman can warn of a big problem that the dreamer may fall into, which will make her suffer in her life, and here she must strive as much as possible to avoid this problem and seek God's help. Therefore, he must try to stay away from them and approach God Almighty and repent to Him, and God Almighty knows best. Or the dream of a girl marrying a girl may indicate the need to be careful not to enter into a job that contains many suspicious and forbidden acts. And we ask Him, the Almighty, to avoid them, and God knows best. Likewise, a lesbian dream may indicate problems and disagreements between the wife and her husband and that this matter must end as soon as possible through discussion, understanding and the help of God Almighty, otherwise it may reach a dead end. It is difficult to escape from crises, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying a pregnant woman A dream about a girl marrying a pregnant girl can indicate different meanings according to these two girls. It protects her from any problems. As for the dream of homosexuality between two girls that the dreamer does not know, it warns her against neglecting the upbringing of the newborn, so that she does her best to raise the child on the Islamic religion

title: The upper canine tooth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of the dream of the upper canine falling out without pain.

preview.html: The upper canine tooth falling out in a dream. Interpreters believe that the dream portends evil and carries many negative interpretations, but it also leads to good in some cases. In the following lines, we will talk about the interpretation of the upper canine falling out for single, married, pregnant, divorced women and men according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. The upper canine falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The upper canine falling in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about the upper canine falling out without pain is an indication of the abundance of supply, blessing, and happiness that awaits the dreamer in his coming days. If the dreamer is going through a certain crisis at the present time and dreams that the upper canine is falling out, this indicates Relief from his distress and he will quickly emerge from this crisis, but in the event that the dreamer is suffering from the accumulation of his debts and the worsening of his financial situation and seeing the upper canine falling to the ground without pain. The vision symbolizes paying off debts and improving the financial situation. The upper canine falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the upper canine falling indicates the loss of a loved one in the coming days. If the dreamer is a seeker of knowledge and sees in his dream the upper canine falling without pain, this means that He will excel in his studies, get the bikes he deserves, and will not waste his effort. The upper canine falling on the hand is considered a sign of facing and overcoming some difficulties in the coming period. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type “Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site” on Google and get the correct interpretations. The upper canine falling in a dream for an unmarried woman. The interpretation of the dream indicates a fall. The upper molar of an unmarried woman indicates that she will soon marry a good man and give birth to a male child from him. If the dreamer had a quarrel with her family and saw in her dream the upper molar falling, this means that these disputes will soon end and that this worry will go away from her shoulders. But if the dreamer is sick and sees her upper right canine falling to the ground, then the vision portends bad luck and may indicate the approaching term, and God (the Almighty) is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams of the upper right canine falling for single women. Seeing the upper right canine of a single woman falling without pain symbolizes that she will gain Lots of money from work in the coming days. If the upper right canine falls out in the dreamer’s dream and she feels pain, the dream may symbolize the imminent death of a loved one, and if the dreamer is engaged and dreams of the upper right canine falling out, the dream may indicate breaking off the engagement due to a major disagreement with her partner. The upper canine falling out in a dream for a woman Married: The interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s falling upper canine tooth indicates that she is engaged in a major quarrel with her husband that may lead to divorce, so she must try to resolve differences and correct matters until they are... Do not regret it later, but if the owner of the vision has never given birth before and dreams of her upper canine falling out, then she has good news about the imminent pregnancy. In the event that the upper canine falls out without pain, the vision indicates an abundance of

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wide abaya according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a wide abaya in a dream means great livelihood and success, and other interpretations for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, such as seeing a woman wearing an embroidered abaya. , or dreaming of chasing a woman wearing a black abaya, or wearing new torn or black abayas or abayas, according to Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Usaimi, Ibn Sirin and others in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of a wide abaya in a dream. Seeing a loose abaya in a dream, especially if it is loose and black, is evidence that The dreamer will obtain money and a great livelihood in the near future. The dream of a wide abaya also indicates that the dreamer will undertake a special project in the future, but she is afraid that the project will fail, but the vision is evidence that she will succeed soon and will work well in her future projects, and her money will increase several times than it is. Now.Seeing an expensive black embroidered abaya in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will live a very hidden material life, and it also confirms that the unmarried woman will live under her father’s umbrella with kindness, care and luxury, but in the event that her father has already died, it is evidence of her responsibility from her brother. As for if she Alone in life, this is evidence that one of her family members will take care of her and spend on her. Seeing a wide abaya in a dream for a single woman is evidence that she is a strong person who loves work and works hard in life to earn a living, succeed, and reach her ambitions in life, where she will be able to collect a lot of money. An unmarried woman wearing a bright abaya in a dream indicates that she will become famous. As for seeing a torn abaya in a dream, and the dreamer refusing to wear it in the dream, this indicates that she will survive a major mistake that she will commit that will completely change her life. Wearing a torn abaya in a dream is evidence of... The dreamer will suffer from some problems in public life, and he will also commit many sins and deviate from the right path. Seeing the dreamer standing in front of a store full of beautiful colored abayas in a dream is evidence that she will do well, and if she is single, it is evidence of her relationship with a person of good morals who will please her. A lot, but if she is married, this proves that she will be very happy with her children and her husband. The black abaya in a dream. It is one of the abayas that is widespread in public life and is worn by many women instead of the colorful abayas worn in public homes. Covering, purity, and hiding magic before people’s eyes. Interpretation of the abaya in a dream: The abaya in a dream indicates abundant livelihood, and the black abaya indicates that the one who is accustomed to wearing black is good, but for the one who is not accustomed to wearing it, it indicates the death of any sick person in the family, because it is worn. For the sake of death, wearing a black abaya in a dream indicates concealment and safety from poverty and marriage, as God Almighty says (They are a garment for you and you are a garment for them). Wearing an abaya indicates abundance in life, concealment, and marriage. As for a pregnant woman, she may be one who has secrets, and whoever turns in front of you may be one of the Watching your news.Interpretation

title: Learn about the most important interpretations of seeing a dress in a dream

preview.html: The dress in a dream is one of the desirable visions, as clothes or clothes in general are a cover and a cover for every person, but the interpretations of seeing a dress in a dream differ according to what the dreamer sees in his dream. The dress in a dream If a person sees a dress in a dream and is not married, this is evidence that God will soon bless him with a beautiful, well-intentioned girl and may be a sign of the dreamer’s stinginess or generosity. Seeing a clothing seller in a dream means an improvement in living conditions and a higher social status. As for seeing a dress in a dream, for a single person it is a sign of his imminent marriage. Seeing a dress in a dream made of all kinds of fabrics indicates many good things that will come to the dreamer. Whoever sees in a dream a dress made of paper, that is, a dress made of paper, this is evidence of the rise of his knowledge and knowledge. And if someone wears a dress made of meat in a dream, the vision is not good, and this is evidence that he ate the orphan’s money and took his right. And since if the dress in the dream is made of iron, this is evidence of the dreamer’s strength and courage, and no one can surpass him. Whoever sees in his dreams that the dead person is wearing the dress Green is a sign that he is a martyr. Whoever sees that he is wearing a new dress, it is torn, and he can fix it, this indicates that this person is walking on the path of magic. Seeing a dress patterned with many colors in the dreamer's dream is evidence that he will hear a talk from the ruler or manager that will greatly annoy him and cause him anxiety. The dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin A clean dress in a dream is a sign of a decent life full of tranquility, as the dreamer gains health and a lot of money. The interpretation of a dream about a white dress in a dream indicates the joy that will soon please the dreamer's heart. If someone sees in a dream that he is wearing a new dress, this is a sign of an imminent marriage. Seeing wearing a dirty dress in a dream means that the dreamer will face problems and crises and that he will be anxious, and it can also indicate his failure. Wearing a white dress in a dream indicates the good condition of the dreamer, his good morals, and the performance of his religious duties, if he is accustomed to wearing this color daily. If one sees himself wearing a red dress in a dream, this is a sign of happiness and joy that will visit the dreamer's heart. Seeing a man wearing a red dress in a dream means that he is busy with amusement And the temptations of worship, and if he suffers from an illness, this is a sign of his recovery. If a person sees a yellow dress in his dream, or if he wears it, this is a sign that his body is affected by the disease. But if the dreamer is sick and sees a black dress in a dream, this is evidence of his death. Getting used to wearing a black dress in reality for the visionary, then seeing in a dream that he is wearing it as well, this is a sign of goodness and justice for him, but if he is not used to wearing it in his life, it is a sign of evil that befalls him. The specialized online dream interpretation site is distinguished by a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type online dream interpretation site on Google. The dress in a single woman’s dream Seeing the dress in

title: Interpretation of sea water in a dream: Drinking sea water in a dream

preview.html: A dream about sea water for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man swimming in the sea and the waves, drinking salt water according to Ibn Sirin and more. Seeing sea water in a dream. Among the dreams that we constantly have in the dreams that the dreamer must see, sea water is one of the most present things in our lives and that we see constantly in all matters of life, but when we see the dream in a dream, it shows many meanings that come to the person who needs to know them. In detail.Interpretation of sea water in a dream. The translator Ibn Shaheen explained that the sea water appeared on its edge, meaning its end, meaning that the country is suffering from drought, poverty, and extreme high prices. And whoever sees that the sea has shrunk and become just a trick, meaning that the ruler of the earth will leave it, and after him goodness will come to the inhabitants of the earth. And whoever sees if he sees himself descending into the sea water, which is turbid water, or descending into it. Sea water and gets dirty with mud, then he falls into trouble or anxiety, so he should beware, and whoever sees himself swimming in the sea and then drowning, this means that he will die as a witness. There are certain interpretations by dream interpretation scholars who believe that the sea is a message of optimism and not a warning. For example, if you saw the sea or walked in it, that is, walked in it without swimming, then this is related to the emergence of adversity, which means that the vision is in real adversity and distress, so whoever sees himself descends into it. The sea and then leaving it without drowning, this indicates that the torment he is going through will end and God will relieve his anxiety. Or if he sees himself crossing the sea from one shore to another without drowning, then he will be saved from worry or from what concerns him in reality, and if a person dreams He pours sea water into the ship, then a son will be born to him if he is married, and he will have a long life, and whoever sees himself bathing in sea water or bathing or bathing with it, God will relieve him of anxiety or save him. Of something he was afraid of, or if he was imprisoned, he will be released soon. Interpretation of sea water in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Sea water in the interpretation has a strong origin, as the sea is the greatest of rivers, an indication of Islam, knowledge, and fertility, as God Almighty said (Indeed, We have provided for them water to tempt them). Perhaps he means With semen, because God Almighty called it water. It is an indication of money, so whoever drinks water from a well if he is sick or healed or gets married if he is free. If the water is muddy or bitter, then the person carrying the vessel will get sick if he is poor, wealthy and single, he will get married if he is married His wife will become pregnant if he or his wife is the one who empties the water. As for the flow of water in homes, it is not praised by the general public. Whoever drinks hot water suffers from anxiety and sadness. It is said: A water well is good and a blessing for the people of the righteous, according to the words of God Almighty (In them are two flowing fountains), It is a calamity for the unrighteous. Water bursting from the wall is a grief for people, like a brother or a friend. Stagnant water is weaker than flowing water. It was said that drinking water is safe from the enemy. Stagnant water is limited. Salty water is turbid. Black water is a woman getting married and there is no good in it. - And the water Dirty miserable life and a blessing to dissolve, on s

If the water is muddy or bitter, then the person carrying the vessel will get sick if he is poor, wealthy and single, he will get married if he is married His wife will become pregnant if he or his wife is the one who empties the water. As for the flow of water in homes, it is not praised by the general public. Whoever drinks hot water suffers from anxiety and sadness. It is said: A water well is good and a blessing for the people of the righteous, according to the words of God Almighty (In them are two flowing fountains), It is a calamity for the unrighteous. Water bursting from the wall is a grief for people, like a brother or a friend. Stagnant water is weaker than flowing water. It was said that drinking water is safe from the enemy.
